Uses of Interface
net.sf.JRecord.ByteIO.IByteReader

  • Packages that use IByteReader 
    Package Description
    net.sf.JRecord.ByteIO
    This package holds low level Record-Oriented IO routines (reading / writing an Array of Bytes).
    net.sf.JRecord.IO
    This package holds all Record-Oriented IO routines.

    • Uses of IByteReader in net.sf.JRecord.ByteIO

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractByteReader
      This abstract class is the base class for all Byte~Reader classes
      class  BaseByteTextReader
      Reads a standard Text file (like standard readLine of Class BufferedReader) except it will return an Array of Bytes (instead of a String).
      class  ByteTextReader
      Reads a standard Text file (like standard readLine of Class BufferedReader) except it will return an Array of Bytes (instead of a String).
      class  CsvByteReader
      Reads a file one line at a time (used for single byte character sets only).
      class  FixedLengthByteReader
      This class performs record oriented reading of Fixed Record Length (i.e.
      class  FujitsuVbByteReader
      This class performs record oriented reading of: Fujitsu Cobol Variable Record Length Binary files into an Array of bytes
      class  MicroFocusByteReader 
      class  TextReader 
      class  VbByteReader
      This class performs record oriented reading of: Mainframe Variable Record Length Binary files Mainframe Variable Record Length Binary files with imbedded block lengths into Array of Bytes
      class  VbDumpByteReader
      ByteReader for Mainframe VB File that also include Block descriptor Word i.e.
      class  VbsByteReader
      This class performs record oriented reading of: Mainframe Variable Record Length Binary files Mainframe Variable Record Length Binary files with imbedded block lengths into Array of Bytes
      class  ZOldBaseByteTextReader
      Reads a standard Text file (like standard readLine of Class BufferedReader) except it will return an Array of Bytes (instead of a String).
